text: ennitt avar karar langhiccatinalum, allahuvinre drstantannal nisedhiccatinalum, an'yayamayi pravacakanmare kealappetuttiyatinalum, tannalute manas'sukal atannukitakkukayan enn avar parannatinalum (avar sapikkappettirikkunnu.) tanneyumalla, avarute satyanisedham karanamayi allahu a manas'sukalute mel mudrakuttiyirikkukayanâ€Œ. akayal curukkattilallate avar visvasikkukayilla
